sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: In noise so rude against me?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Such an act

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That blurs the grace and blush of modesty,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Calls virtue hypocrite, takes off the rose

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: From the fair forehead of an innocent love

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And sets a blister there, makes marriage-vows

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: As false as dicers' oaths: O, such a deed

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: As from the body of contraction plucks

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The very soul, and sweet religion makes

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A rhapsody of words: heaven's face doth glow:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Yea, this solidity and compound mass,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: With tristful visage, as against the doom,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Is thought-sick at the act.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Ay me, what act,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: That roars so loud, and thunders in the index?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Look here, upon this picture, and on this,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The counterfeit presentment of two brothers.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: See, what a grace was seated on this brow;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Hyperion's curls; the front of Jove himself;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: An eye like Mars, to threaten and command;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A station like the herald Mercury

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: New-lighted on a heaven-kissing hill;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A combination and a form indeed,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Where every god did seem to set his seal,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To give the world assurance of a man:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: This was your husband. Look you now, what follows:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Here is your husband; like a mildew'd ear,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Blasting his wholesome brother. Have you eyes?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Could you on this fair mountain leave to feed,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And batten on this moor? Ha! have you eyes?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: You cannot call it love; for at your age

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The hey-day in the blood is tame, it's humble,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And waits upon the judgment: and what judgment

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Would step from this to this? Sense, sure, you have,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Else could you not have motion; but sure, that sense

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Is apoplex'd; for madness would not err,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Nor sense to ecstasy was ne'er so thrall'd

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: But it reserved some quantity of choice,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To serve in such a difference. What devil was't

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That thus hath cozen'd you at hoodman-blind?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Eyes without feeling, feeling without sight,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Ears without hands or eyes, smelling sans all,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Or but a sickly part of one true sense

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Could not so mope.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: O shame! where is thy blush? Rebellious hell,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: If thou canst mutine in a matron's bones,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To flaming youth let virtue be as wax,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And melt in her own fire: proclaim no shame

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: When the compulsive ardour gives the charge,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Since frost itself as actively doth burn

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And reason panders will.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: O Hamlet, speak no more:

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Thou turn'st mine eyes into my very soul;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: And there I see such black and grained spots

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: As will not leave their tinct.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Nay, but to live

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: In the rank sweat of an enseamed bed,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Stew'd in corruption, honeying and making love

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Over the nasty sty,--

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: O, speak to me no more;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: These words, like daggers, enter in mine ears;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: No more, sweet Hamlet!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A murderer and a villain;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A slave that is not twentieth part the tithe

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Of your precedent lord; a vice of kings;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A cutpurse of the empire and the rule,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That from a shelf the precious diadem stole,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And put it in his pocket!

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: No more!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A king of shreds and patches,--
Enter Ghost

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Save me, and hover o'er me with your wings,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: You heavenly guards! What would your gracious figure?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Alas, he's mad!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Do you not come your tardy son to chide,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That, lapsed in time and passion, lets go by

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The important acting of your dread command? O, say!

sceneText.speaker: Ghost
sceneText.text: Do not forget: this visitation

sceneText.speaker: Ghost
sceneText.text: Is but to whet thy almost blunted purpose.

sceneText.speaker: Ghost
sceneText.text: But, look, amazement on thy mother sits:

sceneText.speaker: Ghost
sceneText.text: O, step between her and her fighting soul:

sceneText.speaker: Ghost
sceneText.text: Conceit in weakest bodies strongest works:

sceneText.speaker: Ghost
sceneText.text: Speak to her, Hamlet.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: How is it with you, lady?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Alas, how is't with you,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: That you do bend your eye on vacancy

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: And with the incorporal air do hold discourse?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Forth at your eyes your spirits wildly peep;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: And, as the sleeping soldiers in the alarm,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Your bedded hair, like life in excrements,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Starts up, and stands on end. O gentle son,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Upon the heat and flame of thy distemper

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Sprinkle cool patience. Whereon do you look?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: On him, on him! Look you, how pale he glares!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: His form and cause conjoin'd, preaching to stones,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Would make them capable. Do not look upon me;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Lest with this piteous action you convert

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: My stern effects: then what I have to do

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Will want true colour; tears perchance for blood.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: To whom do you speak this?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Do you see nothing there?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Nothing at all; yet all that is I see.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Nor did you nothing hear?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: No, nothing but ourselves.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Why, look you there! look, how it steals away!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: My father, in his habit as he lived!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Look, where he goes, even now, out at the portal!
Exit Ghost

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: This the very coinage of your brain:

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: This bodiless creation ecstasy

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Is very cunning in.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Ecstasy!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: My pulse, as yours, doth temperately keep time,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And makes as healthful music: it is not madness

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That I have utter'd: bring me to the test,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And I the matter will re-word; which madness

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Would gambol from. Mother, for love of grace,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Lay not that mattering unction to your soul,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That not your trespass, but my madness speaks:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: It will but skin and film the ulcerous place,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Whilst rank corruption, mining all within,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Infects unseen. Confess yourself to heaven;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Repent what's past; avoid what is to come;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And do not spread the compost on the weeds,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To make them ranker. Forgive me this my virtue;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: For in the fatness of these pursy times

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Virtue itself of vice must pardon beg,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Yea, curb and woo for leave to do him good.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: O Hamlet, thou hast cleft my heart in twain.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: O, throw away the worser part of it,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And live the purer with the other half.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Good night: but go not to mine uncle's bed;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Assume a virtue, if you have it not.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That monster, custom, who all sense doth eat,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Of habits devil, is angel yet in this,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That to the use of actions fair and good

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: He likewise gives a frock or livery,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That aptly is put on. Refrain to-night,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And that shall lend a kind of easiness

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To the next abstinence: the next more easy;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: For use almost can change the stamp of nature,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And either [ ] the devil, or throw him out

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: With wondrous potency. Once more, good night:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And when you are desirous to be bless'd,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I'll blessing beg of you. For this same lord,
Pointing to POLONIUS

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I do repent: but heaven hath pleased it so,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To punish me with this and this with me,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That I must be their scourge and minister.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I will bestow him, and will answer well

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The death I gave him. So, again, good night.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I must be cruel, only to be kind:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Thus bad begins and worse remains behind.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: One word more, good lady.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: What shall I do?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Not this, by no means, that I bid you do:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Let the bloat king tempt you again to bed;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Pinch wanton on your cheek; call you his mouse;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And let him, for a pair of reechy kisses,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Or paddling in your neck with his damn'd fingers,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Make you to ravel all this matter out,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That I essentially am not in madness,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: But mad in craft. 'Twere good you let him know;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: For who, that's but a queen, fair, sober, wise,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Would from a paddock, from a bat, a gib,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Such dear concernings hide? who would do so?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: No, in despite of sense and secrecy,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Unpeg the basket on the house's top.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Let the birds fly, and, like the famous ape,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To try conclusions, in the basket creep,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And break your own neck down.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Be thou assured, if words be made of breath,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: And breath of life, I have no life to breathe

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: What thou hast said to me.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I must to England; you know that?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Alack,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: I had forgot: 'tis so concluded on.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: There's letters seal'd: and my two schoolfellows,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Whom I will trust as I will adders fang'd,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: They bear the mandate; they must sweep my way,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And marshal me to knavery. Let it work;

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: For 'tis the sport to have the engineer

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Hoist with his own petard: and 't shall go hard

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: But I will delve one yard below their mines,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And blow them at the moon: O, 'tis most sweet,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: When in one line two crafts directly meet.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: This man shall set me packing:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I'll lug the guts into the neighbour room.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Mother, good night. Indeed this counsellor

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Is now most still, most secret and most grave,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Who was in life a foolish prating knave.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Come, sir, to draw toward an end with you.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Good night, mother.
Exeunt severally; HAMLET dragging in POLONIUS

scenes.text: SCENE I. A room in the castle.

sceneText.text: Enter KING CLAUDIUS, QUEEN GERTRUDE, ROSENCRANTZ, and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: There's matter in these sighs, these profound heaves:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: You must translate: 'tis fit we understand them.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Where is your son?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Bestow this place on us a little while.
Exeunt ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Ah, my good lord, what have I seen to-night!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: What, Gertrude? How does Hamlet?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Mad as the sea and wind, when both contend

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Which is the mightier: in his lawless fit,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Behind the arras hearing something stir,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Whips out his rapier, cries, 'A rat, a rat!'

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: And, in this brainish apprehension, kills

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: The unseen good old man.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: O heavy deed!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: It had been so with us, had we been there:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: His liberty is full of threats to all;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To you yourself, to us, to every one.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Alas, how shall this bloody deed be answer'd?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: It will be laid to us, whose providence

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Should have kept short, restrain'd and out of haunt,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: This mad young man: but so much was our love,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: We would not understand what was most fit;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But, like the owner of a foul disease,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To keep it from divulging, let it feed

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Even on the pith of Life. Where is he gone?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: To draw apart the body he hath kill'd:

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: O'er whom his very madness, like some ore

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Among a mineral of metals base,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Shows itself pure; he weeps for what is done.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: O Gertrude, come away!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The sun no sooner shall the mountains touch,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But we will ship him hence: and this vile deed

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: We must, with all our majesty and skill,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Both countenance and excuse. Ho, Guildenstern!
Re-enter ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Friends both, go join you with some further aid:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Hamlet in madness hath Polonius slain,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And from his mother's closet hath he dragg'd him:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Go seek him out; speak fair, and bring the body

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Into the chapel. I pray you, haste in this.
Exeunt ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Come, Gertrude, we'll call up our wisest friends;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And let them know, both what we mean to do,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And what's untimely done. O, come away!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: My soul is full of discord and dismay.
Exeunt

scenes.text: SCENE II. Another room in the castle.

sceneText.text: Enter HAMLET

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Safely stowed.

sceneText.speaker: GUILDENSTERN:
sceneText.text: [Within] Hamlet! Lord Hamlet!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: What noise? who calls on Hamlet?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: O, here they come.
Enter ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: What have you done, my lord, with the dead body?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Compounded it with dust, whereto 'tis kin.

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Tell us where 'tis, that we may take it thence

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: And bear it to the chapel.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Do not believe it.

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Believe what?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That I can keep your counsel and not mine own.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Besides, to be demanded of a sponge! what

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: replication should be made by the son of a king?

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Take you me for a sponge, my lord?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Ay, sir, that soaks up the king's countenance, his

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: rewards, his authorities. But such officers do the

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: king best service in the end: he keeps them, like

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: an ape, in the corner of his jaw; first mouthed, to

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: be last swallowed: when he needs what you have

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: gleaned, it is but squeezing you, and, sponge, you

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: shall be dry again.

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: I understand you not, my lord.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I am glad of it: a knavish speech sleeps in a

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: foolish ear.

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: My lord, you must tell us where the body is, and go

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: with us to the king.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The body is with the king, but the king is not with

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: the body. The king is a thing--

sceneText.speaker: GUILDENSTERN
sceneText.text: A thing, my lord!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Of nothing: bring me to him. Hide fox, and all after.
Exeunt

scenes.text: SCENE III. Another room in the castle.

sceneText.text: Enter KING CLAUDIUS, attended

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: I have sent to seek him, and to find the body.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How dangerous is it that this man goes loose!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Yet must not we put the strong law on him:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: He's loved of the distracted multitude,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Who like not in their judgment, but their eyes;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And where tis so, the offender's scourge is weigh'd,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But never the offence. To bear all smooth and even,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: This sudden sending him away must seem

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Deliberate pause: diseases desperate grown

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: By desperate appliance are relieved,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Or not at all.
Enter ROSENCRANTZ

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How now! what hath befall'n?

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Where the dead body is bestow'd, my lord,

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: We cannot get from him.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But where is he?

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Without, my lord; guarded, to know your pleasure.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Bring him before us.

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Ho, Guildenstern! bring in my lord.
Enter HAMLET and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Now, Hamlet, where's Polonius?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: At supper.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: At supper! where?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Not where he eats, but where he is eaten: a certain

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: convocation of politic worms are e'en at him. Your

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: worm is your only emperor for diet: we fat all

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: creatures else to fat us, and we fat ourselves for

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: maggots: your fat king and your lean beggar is but

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: variable service, two dishes, but to one table:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: that's the end.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Alas, alas!

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A man may fish with the worm that hath eat of a

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: king, and eat of the fish that hath fed of that worm.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: What dost you mean by this?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Nothing but to show you how a king may go a

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: progress through the guts of a beggar.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Where is Polonius?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: In heaven; send hither to see: if your messenger

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: find him not there, seek him i' the other place

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: yourself. But indeed, if you find him not within

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: this month, you shall nose him as you go up the

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: stairs into the lobby.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Go seek him there.
To some Attendants

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: He will stay till ye come.
Exeunt Attendants

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Hamlet, this deed, for thine especial safety,--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Which we do tender, as we dearly grieve

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: For that which thou hast done,--must send thee hence

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: With fiery quickness: therefore prepare thyself;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The bark is ready, and the wind at help,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The associates tend, and every thing is bent

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: For England.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: For England!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Ay, Hamlet.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Good.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: So is it, if thou knew'st our purposes.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I see a cherub that sees them. But, come; for

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: England! Farewell, dear mother.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Thy loving father, Hamlet.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: My mother: father and mother is man and wife; man

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: and wife is one flesh; and so, my mother. Come, for England!
Exit

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Follow him at foot; tempt him with speed aboard;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Delay it not; I'll have him hence to-night:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Away! for every thing is seal'd and done

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That else leans on the affair: pray you, make haste.
Exeunt ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And, England, if my love thou hold'st at aught--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As my great power thereof may give thee sense,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Since yet thy cicatrice looks raw and red

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: After the Danish sword, and thy free awe

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Pays homage to us--thou mayst not coldly set

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Our sovereign process; which imports at full,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: By letters congruing to that effect,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The present death of Hamlet. Do it, England;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: For like the hectic in my blood he rages,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And thou must cure me: till I know 'tis done,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Howe'er my haps, my joys were ne'er begun.
Exit

scenes.text: SCENE IV. A plain in Denmark.

sceneText.text: Enter FORTINBRAS, a Captain, and Soldiers, marching

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: Go, captain, from me greet the Danish king;

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: Tell him that, by his licence, Fortinbras

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: Craves the conveyance of a promised march

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: Over his kingdom. You know the rendezvous.

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: If that his majesty would aught with us,

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: We shall express our duty in his eye;

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: And let him know so.

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: I will do't, my lord.

sceneText.speaker: PRINCE FORTINBRAS
sceneText.text: Go softly on.
Exeunt FORTINBRAS and Soldiers
Enter HAMLET, ROSENCRANTZ, GUILDENSTERN, and others

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Good sir, whose powers are these?

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: They are of Norway, sir.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: How purposed, sir, I pray you?

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: Against some part of Poland.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Who commands them, sir?

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: The nephews to old Norway, Fortinbras.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Goes it against the main of Poland, sir,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Or for some frontier?

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: Truly to speak, and with no addition,

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: We go to gain a little patch of ground

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: That hath in it no profit but the name.

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: To pay five ducats, five, I would not farm it;

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: Nor will it yield to Norway or the Pole

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: A ranker rate, should it be sold in fee.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Why, then the Polack never will defend it.

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: Yes, it is already garrison'd.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Two thousand souls and twenty thousand ducats

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Will not debate the question of this straw:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: This is the imposthume of much wealth and peace,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That inward breaks, and shows no cause without

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Why the man dies. I humbly thank you, sir.

sceneText.speaker: Captain
sceneText.text: God be wi' you, sir.
Exit

sceneText.speaker: ROSENCRANTZ
sceneText.text: Wilt please you go, my lord?

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: I'll be with you straight go a little before.
Exeunt all except HAMLET

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: How all occasions do inform against me,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And spur my dull revenge! What is a man,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: If his chief good and market of his time

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Be but to sleep and feed? a beast, no more.

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Sure, he that made us with such large discourse,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Looking before and after, gave us not

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That capability and god-like reason

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To fust in us unused. Now, whether it be

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Bestial oblivion, or some craven scruple

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Of thinking too precisely on the event,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: A thought which, quarter'd, hath but one part wisdom

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And ever three parts coward, I do not know

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Why yet I live to say 'This thing's to do;'

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Sith I have cause and will and strength and means

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To do't. Examples gross as earth exhort me:

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Witness this army of such mass and charge

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Led by a delicate and tender prince,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Whose spirit with divine ambition puff'd

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Makes mouths at the invisible event,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Exposing what is mortal and unsure

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To all that fortune, death and danger dare,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Even for an egg-shell. Rightly to be great

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Is not to stir without great argument,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: But greatly to find quarrel in a straw

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: When honour's at the stake. How stand I then,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That have a father kill'd, a mother stain'd,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Excitements of my reason and my blood,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: And let all sleep? while, to my shame, I see

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: The imminent death of twenty thousand men,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: That, for a fantasy and trick of fame,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Go to their graves like beds, fight for a plot

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Whereon the numbers cannot try the cause,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: Which is not tomb enough and continent

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: To hide the slain? O, from this time forth,

sceneText.speaker: HAMLET
sceneText.text: My thoughts be bloody, or be nothing worth!
Exit

scenes.text: SCENE V. Elsinore. A room in the castle.

sceneText.text: Enter QUEEN GERTRUDE, HORATIO, and a Gentleman

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: I will not speak with her.

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: She is importunate, indeed distract:

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Her mood will needs be pitied.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: What would she have?

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: She speaks much of her father; says she hears

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: There's tricks i' the world; and hems, and beats her heart;

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Spurns enviously at straws; speaks things in doubt,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: That carry but half sense: her speech is nothing,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Yet the unshaped use of it doth move

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: The hearers to collection; they aim at it,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: And botch the words up fit to their own thoughts;

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Which, as her winks, and nods, and gestures

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: yield them,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Indeed would make one think there might be thought,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Though nothing sure, yet much unhappily.

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: 'Twere good she were spoken with; for she may strew

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: Dangerous conjectures in ill-breeding minds.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Let her come in.
Exit HORATIO

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: To my sick soul, as sin's true nature is,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Each toy seems prologue to some great amiss:

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: So full of artless jealousy is guilt,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: It spills itself in fearing to be spilt.
Re-enter HORATIO, with OPHELIA

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Where is the beauteous majesty of Denmark?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: How now, Ophelia!

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: [Sings]

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: How should I your true love know

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: From another one?

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: By his cockle hat and staff,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And his sandal shoon.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Alas, sweet lady, what imports this song?

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Say you? nay, pray you, mark.
Sings

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: He is dead and gone, lady,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: He is dead and gone;

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: At his head a grass-green turf,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: At his heels a stone.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Nay, but, Ophelia,--

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Pray you, mark.
Sings

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: White his shroud as the mountain snow,--
Enter KING CLAUDIUS

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Alas, look here, my lord.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: [Sings]

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Larded with sweet flowers

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Which bewept to the grave did go

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: With true-love showers.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How do you, pretty lady?

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Well, God 'ild you! They say the owl was a baker's

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: daughter. Lord, we know what we are, but know not

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: what we may be. God be at your table!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Conceit upon her father.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Pray you, let's have no words of this; but when they

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: ask you what it means, say you this:
Sings

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: To-morrow is Saint Valentine's day,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: All in the morning betime,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And I a maid at your window,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: To be your Valentine.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Then up he rose, and donn'd his clothes,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And dupp'd the chamber-door;

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Let in the maid, that out a maid

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Never departed more.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Pretty Ophelia!

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Indeed, la, without an oath, I'll make an end on't:
Sings

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: By Gis and by Saint Charity,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Alack, and fie for shame!

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Young men will do't, if they come to't;

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: By cock, they are to blame.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Quoth she, before you tumbled me,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: You promised me to wed.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: So would I ha' done, by yonder sun,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: An thou hadst not come to my bed.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How long hath she been thus?

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: I hope all will be well. We must be patient: but I

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: cannot choose but weep, to think they should lay him

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: i' the cold ground. My brother shall know of it:

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: and so I thank you for your good counsel. Come, my

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: coach! Good night, ladies; good night, sweet ladies;

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: good night, good night.
Exit

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Follow her close; give her good watch,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: I pray you.
Exit HORATIO

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: O, this is the poison of deep grief; it springs

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: All from her father's death. O Gertrude, Gertrude,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: When sorrows come, they come not single spies

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But in battalions. First, her father slain:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Next, your son gone; and he most violent author

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Of his own just remove: the people muddied,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Thick and unwholesome in their thoughts and whispers,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: For good Polonius' death; and we have done but greenly,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: In hugger-mugger to inter him: poor Ophelia

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Divided from herself and her fair judgment,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Without the which we are pictures, or mere beasts:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Last, and as much containing as all these,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Her brother is in secret come from France;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Feeds on his wonder, keeps himself in clouds,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And wants not buzzers to infect his ear

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: With pestilent speeches of his father's death;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Wherein necessity, of matter beggar'd,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Will nothing stick our person to arraign

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: In ear and ear. O my dear Gertrude, this,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Like to a murdering-piece, in many places

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Gives me superfluous death.
A noise within

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Alack, what noise is this?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Where are my Switzers? Let them guard the door.
Enter another Gentleman

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: What is the matter?

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Save yourself, my lord:

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: The ocean, overpeering of his list,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Eats not the flats with more impetuous haste

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Than young Laertes, in a riotous head,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: O'erbears your officers. The rabble call him lord;

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: And, as the world were now but to begin,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Antiquity forgot, custom not known,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: The ratifiers and props of every word,

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: They cry 'Choose we: Laertes shall be king:'

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: Caps, hands, and tongues, applaud it to the clouds:

sceneText.speaker: Gentleman
sceneText.text: 'Laertes shall be king, Laertes king!'

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: How cheerfully on the false trail they cry!

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: O, this is counter, you false Danish dogs!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The doors are broke.
Noise within
Enter LAERTES, armed; Danes following

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Where is this king? Sirs, stand you all without.

sceneText.speaker: Danes
sceneText.text: No, let's come in.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I pray you, give me leave.

sceneText.speaker: Danes
sceneText.text: We will, we will.
They retire without the door

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I thank you: keep the door. O thou vile king,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Give me my father!

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Calmly, good Laertes.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: That drop of blood that's calm proclaims me bastard,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Cries cuckold to my father, brands the harlot

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Even here, between the chaste unsmirched brow

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Of my true mother.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: What is the cause, Laertes,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That thy rebellion looks so giant-like?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Let him go, Gertrude; do not fear our person:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: There's such divinity doth hedge a king,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That treason can but peep to what it would,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Acts little of his will. Tell me, Laertes,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Why thou art thus incensed. Let him go, Gertrude.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Speak, man.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Where is my father?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Dead.

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: But not by him.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Let him demand his fill.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: How came he dead? I'll not be juggled with:

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: To hell, allegiance! vows, to the blackest devil!

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Conscience and grace, to the profoundest pit!

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I dare damnation. To this point I stand,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: That both the worlds I give to negligence,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Let come what comes; only I'll be revenged

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Most thoroughly for my father.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Who shall stay you?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: My will, not all the world:

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: And for my means, I'll husband them so well,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: They shall go far with little.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Good Laertes,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If you desire to know the certainty

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Of your dear father's death, is't writ in your revenge,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That, swoopstake, you will draw both friend and foe,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Winner and loser?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: None but his enemies.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Will you know them then?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: To his good friends thus wide I'll ope my arms;

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: And like the kind life-rendering pelican,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Repast them with my blood.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Why, now you speak

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Like a good child and a true gentleman.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That I am guiltless of your father's death,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And am most sensible in grief for it,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: It shall as level to your judgment pierce

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As day does to your eye.

sceneText.speaker: Danes
sceneText.text: [Within] Let her come in.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: How now! what noise is that?
Re-enter OPHELIA

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: O heat, dry up my brains! tears seven times salt,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Burn out the sense and virtue of mine eye!

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: By heaven, thy madness shall be paid by weight,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Till our scale turn the beam. O rose of May!

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Dear maid, kind sister, sweet Ophelia!

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: O heavens! is't possible, a young maid's wits

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Should be as moral as an old man's life?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Nature is fine in love, and where 'tis fine,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: It sends some precious instance of itself

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: After the thing it loves.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: [Sings]

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: They bore him barefaced on the bier;

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Hey non nonny, nonny, hey nonny;

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And in his grave rain'd many a tear:--

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Fare you well, my dove!

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Hadst thou thy wits, and didst persuade revenge,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: It could not move thus.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: [Sings]

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: You must sing a-down a-down,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: An you call him a-down-a.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: O, how the wheel becomes it! It is the false

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: steward, that stole his master's daughter.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: This nothing's more than matter.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: There's rosemary, that's for remembrance; pray,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: love, remember: and there is pansies. that's for thoughts.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: A document in madness, thoughts and remembrance fitted.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: There's fennel for you, and columbines: there's rue

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: for you; and here's some for me: we may call it

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: herb-grace o' Sundays: O you must wear your rue with

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: a difference. There's a daisy: I would give you

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: some violets, but they withered all when my father

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: died: they say he made a good end,--
Sings

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: For bonny sweet Robin is all my joy.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Thought and affliction, passion, hell itself,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: She turns to favour and to prettiness.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: [Sings]

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And will he not come again?

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And will he not come again?

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: No, no, he is dead:

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: Go to thy death-bed:

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: He never will come again.

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: His beard was as white as snow,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: All flaxen was his poll:

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: He is gone, he is gone,

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And we cast away moan:

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: God ha' mercy on his soul!

sceneText.speaker: OPHELIA
sceneText.text: And of all Christian souls, I pray God. God be wi' ye.
Exit

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Do you see this, O God?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Laertes, I must commune with your grief,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Or you deny me right. Go but apart,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Make choice of whom your wisest friends you will.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And they shall hear and judge 'twixt you and me:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If by direct or by collateral hand

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: They find us touch'd, we will our kingdom give,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Our crown, our life, and all that we can ours,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To you in satisfaction; but if not,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Be you content to lend your patience to us,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And we shall jointly labour with your soul

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To give it due content.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Let this be so;

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: His means of death, his obscure funeral--

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: No trophy, sword, nor hatchment o'er his bones,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: No noble rite nor formal ostentation--

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Cry to be heard, as 'twere from heaven to earth,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: That I must call't in question.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: So you shall;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And where the offence is let the great axe fall.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: I pray you, go with me.
Exeunt

scenes.text: SCENE VI. Another room in the castle.

sceneText.text: Enter HORATIO and a Servant

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: What are they that would speak with me?

sceneText.speaker: Servant
sceneText.text: Sailors, sir: they say they have letters for you.

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: Let them come in.
Exit Servant

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: I do not know from what part of the world

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: I should be greeted, if not from Lord Hamlet.
Enter Sailors

sceneText.speaker: First Sailor
sceneText.text: God bless you, sir.

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: Let him bless thee too.

sceneText.speaker: First Sailor
sceneText.text: He shall, sir, an't please him. There's a letter for

sceneText.speaker: First Sailor
sceneText.text: you, sir; it comes from the ambassador that was

sceneText.speaker: First Sailor
sceneText.text: bound for England; if your name be Horatio, as I am

sceneText.speaker: First Sailor
sceneText.text: let to know it is.

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: [Reads] 'Horatio, when thou shalt have overlooked

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: this, give these fellows some means to the king:

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: they have letters for him. Ere we were two days old

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: at sea, a pirate of very warlike appointment gave us

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: chase. Finding ourselves too slow of sail, we put on

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: a compelled valour, and in the grapple I boarded

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: them: on the instant they got clear of our ship; so

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: I alone became their prisoner. They have dealt with

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: me like thieves of mercy: but they knew what they

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: did; I am to do a good turn for them. Let the king

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: have the letters I have sent; and repair thou to me

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: with as much speed as thou wouldst fly death. I

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: have words to speak in thine ear will make thee

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: dumb; yet are they much too light for the bore of

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: the matter. These good fellows will bring thee

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: where I am. Rosencrantz and Guildenstern hold their

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: course for England: of them I have much to tell

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: thee. Farewell.

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: 'He that thou knowest thine, HAMLET.'

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: Come, I will make you way for these your letters;

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: And do't the speedier, that you may direct me

sceneText.speaker: HORATIO
sceneText.text: To him from whom you brought them.
Exeunt

scenes.text: SCENE VII. Another room in the castle.

sceneText.text: Enter KING CLAUDIUS and LAERTES

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Now must your conscience my acquaintance seal,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And you must put me in your heart for friend,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Sith you have heard, and with a knowing ear,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That he which hath your noble father slain

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Pursued my life.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: It well appears: but tell me

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Why you proceeded not against these feats,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: So crimeful and so capital in nature,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: As by your safety, wisdom, all things else,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: You mainly were stirr'd up.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: O, for two special reasons;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Which may to you, perhaps, seem much unsinew'd,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But yet to me they are strong. The queen his mother

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Lives almost by his looks; and for myself--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: My virtue or my plague, be it either which--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: She's so conjunctive to my life and soul,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That, as the star moves not but in his sphere,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: I could not but by her. The other motive,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Why to a public count I might not go,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Is the great love the general gender bear him;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Who, dipping all his faults in their affection,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Would, like the spring that turneth wood to stone,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Convert his gyves to graces; so that my arrows,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Too slightly timber'd for so loud a wind,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Would have reverted to my bow again,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And not where I had aim'd them.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: And so have I a noble father lost;

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: A sister driven into desperate terms,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Whose worth, if praises may go back again,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Stood challenger on mount of all the age

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: For her perfections: but my revenge will come.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Break not your sleeps for that: you must not think

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That we are made of stuff so flat and dull

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That we can let our beard be shook with danger

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And think it pastime. You shortly shall hear more:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: I loved your father, and we love ourself;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And that, I hope, will teach you to imagine--
Enter a Messenger

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How now! what news?

sceneText.speaker: Messenger
sceneText.text: Letters, my lord, from Hamlet:

sceneText.speaker: Messenger
sceneText.text: This to your majesty; this to the queen.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: From Hamlet! who brought them?

sceneText.speaker: Messenger
sceneText.text: Sailors, my lord, they say; I saw them not:

sceneText.speaker: Messenger
sceneText.text: They were given me by Claudio; he received them

sceneText.speaker: Messenger
sceneText.text: Of him that brought them.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Laertes, you shall hear them. Leave us.
Exit Messenger
Reads

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: 'High and mighty, You shall know I am set naked on

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: your kingdom. To-morrow shall I beg leave to see

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: your kingly eyes: when I shall, first asking your

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: pardon thereunto, recount the occasion of my sudden

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: and more strange return. 'HAMLET.'

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: What should this mean? Are all the rest come back?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Or is it some abuse, and no such thing?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Know you the hand?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: 'Tis Hamlets character. 'Naked!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And in a postscript here, he says 'alone.'

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Can you advise me?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I'm lost in it, my lord. But let him come;

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: It warms the very sickness in my heart,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: That I shall live and tell him to his teeth,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: 'Thus didest thou.'

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If it be so, Laertes--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As how should it be so? how otherwise?--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Will you be ruled by me?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Ay, my lord;

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: So you will not o'errule me to a peace.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To thine own peace. If he be now return'd,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As checking at his voyage, and that he means

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: No more to undertake it, I will work him

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To an exploit, now ripe in my device,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Under the which he shall not choose but fall:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And for his death no wind of blame shall breathe,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But even his mother shall uncharge the practise

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And call it accident.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: My lord, I will be ruled;

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: The rather, if you could devise it so

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: That I might be the organ.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: It falls right.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: You have been talk'd of since your travel much,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And that in Hamlet's hearing, for a quality

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Wherein, they say, you shine: your sum of parts

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Did not together pluck such envy from him

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As did that one, and that, in my regard,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Of the unworthiest siege.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: What part is that, my lord?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: A very riband in the cap of youth,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Yet needful too; for youth no less becomes

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The light and careless livery that it wears

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Than settled age his sables and his weeds,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Importing health and graveness. Two months since,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Here was a gentleman of Normandy:--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: I've seen myself, and served against, the French,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And they can well on horseback: but this gallant

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Had witchcraft in't; he grew unto his seat;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And to such wondrous doing brought his horse,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As he had been incorpsed and demi-natured

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: With the brave beast: so far he topp'd my thought,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That I, in forgery of shapes and tricks,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Come short of what he did.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: A Norman was't?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: A Norman.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Upon my life, Lamond.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The very same.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I know him well: he is the brooch indeed

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: And gem of all the nation.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: He made confession of you,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And gave you such a masterly report

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: For art and exercise in your defence

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And for your rapier most especially,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That he cried out, 'twould be a sight indeed,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If one could match you: the scrimers of their nation,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: He swore, had had neither motion, guard, nor eye,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If you opposed them. Sir, this report of his

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Did Hamlet so envenom with his envy

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That he could nothing do but wish and beg

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Your sudden coming o'er, to play with him.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Now, out of this,--

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: What out of this, my lord?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Laertes, was your father dear to you?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Or are you like the painting of a sorrow,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: A face without a heart?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Why ask you this?

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Not that I think you did not love your father;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: But that I know love is begun by time;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And that I see, in passages of proof,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Time qualifies the spark and fire of it.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: There lives within the very flame of love

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: A kind of wick or snuff that will abate it;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And nothing is at a like goodness still;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: For goodness, growing to a plurisy,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Dies in his own too much: that we would do

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: We should do when we would; for this 'would' changes

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And hath abatements and delays as many

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As there are tongues, are hands, are accidents;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And then this 'should' is like a spendthrift sigh,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: That hurts by easing. But, to the quick o' the ulcer:--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Hamlet comes back: what would you undertake,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: To show yourself your father's son in deed

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: More than in words?

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: To cut his throat i' the church.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: No place, indeed, should murder sanctuarize;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Revenge should have no bounds. But, good Laertes,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Will you do this, keep close within your chamber.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Hamlet return'd shall know you are come home:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: We'll put on those shall praise your excellence

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And set a double varnish on the fame

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: The Frenchman gave you, bring you in fine together

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And wager on your heads: he, being remiss,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Most generous and free from all contriving,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Will not peruse the foils; so that, with ease,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Or with a little shuffling, you may choose

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: A sword unbated, and in a pass of practise

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Requite him for your father.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I will do't:

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: And, for that purpose, I'll anoint my sword.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I bought an unction of a mountebank,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: So mortal that, but dip a knife in it,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Where it draws blood no cataplasm so rare,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Collected from all simples that have virtue

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Under the moon, can save the thing from death

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: That is but scratch'd withal: I'll touch my point

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: With this contagion, that, if I gall him slightly,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: It may be death.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Let's further think of this;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Weigh what convenience both of time and means

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: May fit us to our shape: if this should fail,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And that our drift look through our bad performance,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: 'Twere better not assay'd: therefore this project

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Should have a back or second, that might hold,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If this should blast in proof. Soft! let me see:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: We'll make a solemn wager on your cunnings: I ha't.

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: When in your motion you are hot and dry--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: As make your bouts more violent to that end--

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: And that he calls for drink, I'll have prepared him

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: A chalice for the nonce, whereon but sipping,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: If he by chance escape your venom'd stuck,

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Our purpose may hold there.
Enter QUEEN GERTRUDE

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How now, sweet queen!

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: One woe doth tread upon another's heel,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: So fast they follow; your sister's drown'd, Laertes.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Drown'd! O, where?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: There is a willow grows aslant a brook,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: That shows his hoar leaves in the glassy stream;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: There with fantastic garlands did she come

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Of crow-flowers, nettles, daisies, and long purples

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: That liberal shepherds give a grosser name,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: But our cold maids do dead men's fingers call them:

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: There, on the pendent boughs her coronet weeds

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Clambering to hang, an envious sliver broke;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: When down her weedy trophies and herself

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Fell in the weeping brook. Her clothes spread wide;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: And, mermaid-like, awhile they bore her up:

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Which time she chanted snatches of old tunes;

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: As one incapable of her own distress,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Or like a creature native and indued

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Unto that element: but long it could not be

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Till that her garments, heavy with their drink,

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Pull'd the poor wretch from her melodious lay

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: To muddy death.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Alas, then, she is drown'd?

sceneText.speaker: QUEEN GERTRUDE
sceneText.text: Drown'd, drown'd.

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Too much of water hast thou, poor Ophelia,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: And therefore I forbid my tears: but yet

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: It is our trick; nature her custom holds,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: Let shame say what it will: when these are gone,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: The woman will be out. Adieu, my lord:

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: I have a speech of fire, that fain would blaze,

sceneText.speaker: LAERTES
sceneText.text: But that this folly douts it.
Exit

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Let's follow, Gertrude:

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: How much I had to do to calm his rage!

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Now fear I this will give it start again;

sceneText.speaker: KING CLAUDIUS
sceneText.text: Therefore let's follow.
Exeunt

scenes.text: SCENE I. A churchyard.

sceneText.text: Enter two Clowns, with spades, & c

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: Is she to be buried in Christian burial that

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: wilfully seeks her own salvation?

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: I tell thee she is: and therefore make her grave

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: straight: the crowner hath sat on her, and finds it

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Christian burial.

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: How can that be, unless she drowned herself in her

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: own defence?

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Why, 'tis found so.

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: It must be 'se offendendo;' it cannot be else. For

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: here lies the point: if I drown myself wittingly,

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: it argues an act: and an act hath three branches: it

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: is, to act, to do, to perform: argal, she drowned

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: herself wittingly.

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Nay, but hear you, goodman delver,--

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: Give me leave. Here lies the water; good: here

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: stands the man; good; if the man go to this water,

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: and drown himself, it is, will he, nill he, he

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: goes,--mark you that; but if the water come to him

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: and drown him, he drowns not himself: argal, he

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: that is not guilty of his own death shortens not his own life.

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: But is this law?

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: Ay, marry, is't; crowner's quest law.

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Will you ha' the truth on't? If this had not been

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: a gentlewoman, she should have been buried out o'

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Christian burial.

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: Why, there thou say'st: and the more pity that

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: great folk should have countenance in this world to

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: drown or hang themselves, more than their even

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: Christian. Come, my spade. There is no ancient

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: gentleman but gardeners, ditchers, and grave-makers:

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: they hold up Adam's profession.

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Was he a gentleman?

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: He was the first that ever bore arms.

sceneText.speaker: Second Clown
sceneText.text: Why, he had none.

sceneText.speaker: First Clown
sceneText.text: What, art a heathen? How dost thou understand the
